recommended_degree: Perhotelan, Manajemen Perhotelan dan Pariwisata, Pengelolaan Perhotelan, Hospitaliti dan Pariwisata, Hospitality dan Pariwisata (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
- Assist in setting up and preparing the restaurant or banquet areas before service.
- Support serving guests, clearing tables, and maintaining service standards.
- Help prepare beverages or basic drinks (non-alcoholic/bar support).
- Manage table setups, cutlery polishing, and side duties.
- Assist in maintaining cleanliness and organization of the service area.
- Provide friendly customer service and communicate guest needs to the team.
